value.title: Connect and analyze your Dynamics 365 data​
value.excerpt: Connect and analyze your Dynamics 365 Data​

value.title: Get to your data on the go with the Power BI Mobile apps
value.excerpt: As a consumer, you'll use the Power BI mobile app to review and interact with the content that is available to you in the Power BI service while you're on the go. This module provides the information that you need to work effectively with the Power BI mobile apps.

value.title: Manage datasets in Power BI
value.excerpt: With Microsoft Power BI, you can build multiple reports from a single dataset, meaning that if you change the dataset, all reports will be updated with that change. Additionally, you can clean and prep data once rather than repeatedly for each report.

value.title: Add colored KPI arrows to Power BI 2019 version
value.excerpt: Do you know how to create colored KPIs in Power BI in 2019? In this video I am going to show you the way I do nowadays. Do you have a better way? Please share it with us :) #powerbi #kpipowerbi #curbal  Here you can download all the pbix files: https://curbal.com/donwload-center  SUBSCRIBE to learn more

value.title: A quick look at the new Power BI Report Builder
value.excerpt: Patrick takes a quick look at Power BI Report Builder including how to get it. This report builder is optimized for the Power BI service. Patrick calls out a few reasons this is the case.  Power BI Paginated Report Builder Now Available https://powerbi.microsoft.com/en-us/blog/power-bi-paginated-report-builder-now-available/

value.title: Call any Power BI REST API with PowerShell
value.excerpt: Not sure what a REST API is? Or what you can do with them in Power BI? Find out how you can easily take advantage of them without having to write a bunch of code.
